Name: Nelly Cristina
description:
Nelly is 67 years old and studied through the fifth grade. She is married and her husband is a farmer. They have four children who live apart from them.

Nelly has been managing a business of selling tortillas for 10 years. Her business is located at her house and she works from 5:00 A.M. to 12:00 P.M. She will use this loan to buy corn for producing and selling tortillas. Nelly will also acquire compost for her husbandâ€™s cornfield.

Her dream is to maintain her business and generate more income.
